In the foreground, a shirtless person wearing yellow swimming trunks is standing at the edge of a dark gray diving board, leaning slightly forward and looking down at the water. Silver metal handrails are positioned on either side of the board. A light-colored deck surrounds the pool, and large, geometric shadows, likely cast by the building structure or window frames, fall across approximately half of the water.**

Please note that the video features **multiple subjects with a clear main focus**, so the description should focus on the main subject.
